meaning_str.bing:
conj. 因为；由于；既然；从…以后
adv. 此后；后来；自…以后；从…以来
prep. 自…以后；从…以来；（表示气愤）何曾
网络. 自从；自……以来；自从…以来

此后；后来；自…以后；从…以来
自…以后；从…以来；（表示气愤）何曾

自从；从…以后；自…以后；从…以来；（表示气愤）何曾；什么时候
既然；鉴于；因为；由于；从…以后；自…以来
从那时起；此后；以后；之后；自…以后；从…起；从…开始；从…以来

1.en: Thus three-quarters of all the foreign currency reserves accumulated since the beginning of time have been piled up in this decade.
1.cn: 因此，有史以来累积的所有外汇储备，有四分之三是最近10年内积累起来的。

2.en: Since time has such different meanings in different cultures, communication is often difficult.
2.cn: 因为时间对于不同文化背景的人有如此多的不同的意义，相互间的交流常常会很困难。

3.en: Technically it was the first full year since the end of the Great Recession.
3.cn: 从技术上讲，这是大萧条结束后的第一个完整年度。

0.en: But, everything is different now. Since we moved.
0.cn: 可是，自从我们搬到这里后，一切都不一样了。

1.en: And since Hunley shut us down, they've been escalating unchecked.
1.cn: 自从亨利解散了我们部门后，这个组织就越加猖狂。

2.en: Have you felt that at all? Since you became a mother?
2.cn: 你有过这种感觉吗，自从你成为母亲？

3.en: Ever since I broke my nose I've never had a sense of smell!
3.cn: 自从我摔断鼻子后，就闻不到味道了！

4.en: You keep your voice down. You have had a bug up your ass since you showed up here.
4.cn: 小点声，你自从回来就一直在大喊大叫。

5.en: Ever since you took that position, you talk as if you run the place.
5.cn: 自从你接受了那职位，你语气就像是管事的一样。

6.en: How long has Polly been sick? Since we came out on our boat trip.
6.cn: 波利生病有多长时间了？自从我们驾船出来游玩开始。

7.en: Mr Carson, they've been testing the system since the Romans left.
7.cn: 卡森先生，自从罗马人离开，社会就一直在经受考验。

8.en: You mean since gossip girl published pictures of him and some skank?
8.cn: 你是说自从"八卦天后"公开了他和某个女人的照片？

9.en: Muggle? Non-magic folk. This boy's had his name down ever since you were born.
9.cn: 麻瓜？不懂魔法的人，这孩子自从你出生之前就注册了。

10.en: So, will you start riding the bus again? I don't know. I haven't been up there since...
10.cn: 你以后还会坐校车吗? 我也说不好，自从上次...

11.en: Since Amy and I have been living together, we've been bickering like my parents used to.
11.cn: 自从我和艾米住同居后，就一直像我父母以前那样争吵。

12.en: Well, don't feel bad. I think we've all been distracted since the girls entered our lives.
12.cn: 别难过了，我觉得自从我们的生活有了女人后，我们都分心了。

13.en: Things have gotten a lot worse since you left Bikini Bottom. Or should I say Planktopolis.
13.cn: 自从你们离开比基尼岛事情变得很严重了。普兰克统治了一切。

14.en: I haven't seen you since your party. Someone said you left crying. How are you?
14.cn: 自从派对之后，我就没见过你了，听说你是哭着离开的，最近过得好吗？

15.en: But honestly, since you've been back, I've, wondered if your mind was even on college.
15.cn: 但老实讲，自从你回来后，我一直在想 你是否还记得上大学这事。

16.en: Okay, what is going on? Well, ever since Amy started working with Howard, she hasn't been home.
16.cn: 到底怎么了？自从艾米开始和霍华德一起工作，她就没回过家。

17.en: I haven't seen him this stuck since he tried to figure out the third Matrix movie.
17.cn: 自从他尝试理清《黑客帝国》第三部之后我就没见过他能卡成这个样子。

18.en: You were a partner in a top firm. Yes. And I can't get a job since the scandal.
18.cn: 你曾是顶尖律所的合伙人。没错，但自从那个丑闻之后我就找不到工作了。

19.en: Sorry? I've been dreaming about going to the Large Hadron Collider since I was nine years old.
19.cn: 抱歉？我自从九岁起就一直梦想着有朝一日去看大型强子对撞机。
